Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.objectmapper

Klasse CategoryMapper

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.card2brain.objectmapper.CategoryMapper
@Component public class CategoryMapper extends Object
This class is responsible for mapping between Category and CategoryDto objects.
Seit:
16.01.2023

    • toDto

      public CategoryDto toDto(Category category)
      This method maps a Category object to a CategoryDto object
      Parameter:
      category - the category object to be mapped
      Gibt zurück:
      the mapped categoryDto object

    • toCategory

      public Category toCategory(CategoryDto categoryDto) throws RuntimeException
      This method mapps CategoryDto to Category
      Parameter:
      categoryDto - the category object containing the name to search for
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of categories with the given name
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException

    • fromIdToUser

      public User fromIdToUser(Long userId)
      This method maps a user id to a User object
      Parameter:
      userId - id of user
      Gibt zurück:
      the mapped User object
      Löst aus:
      Exception - if user with id does not exist

    • fromIdToCategory

      public Category fromIdToCategory(long categoryId)
      This method maps a category id to a Category object
      Parameter:
      categoryId - id of category
      Gibt zurück:
      the mapped category object
      Löst aus:
      UserNotFoundException - if category with id does not exist
